item.description:
Hi everyone,


We'll meet at Jamn' Java and start walking no later than 6:30. If you are lost or running late my cell phone is 508-472-7900. We will walk the bike path and/or around the town for about an 1 hour to 1.5 hours. Parking is available in the lot behind mystic ave.

Also, we will be having a intern photographer from BU joining to take photos and promote the walking group. If you can please wear your most athletic looking clothes/gear that would be a huge help!

Look forward to seeing everyone then.
item.name: Minuteman Trail Walk - Arlington
